title: 07/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains very patriotically that Charles Barkley speaks the truth because when Giannis wasn't on the court, both Jrue Holiday and the offense both shined. Luka Doncic needs a star now because unlike Dirk, he doesn't need time to develop. He's the best young player in the world. Green Bay didn't call Aaron Rodgers on his bluff and even though the Denver story sounds good, he won't be leaving this year. The NFL has a very clear distinction this year between four very bad teams and very good teams. Plus, another edition of "Where Colin was Right and Wrong!"

Guest: Ric Bucher

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
